en: We have heard with our ears, O God, Our fathers have told us, What work thou didst in their days, In the days of old.
hmr: Aw Pathien, tienlaia an dam laia i thilthawhai kha. Kan thlatuhaiin an mi hril, kan nain kan hriet,

en: Thou didst drive out the nations with thy hand; But them thou didst plant: Thou didst afflict the peoples; But them thou didst spread abroad.
hmr: Nangin i kutin hnam tin chu i hnawt suok a, anni chu i phun ta thung a, Mi tin chu i sukrimsih a, anni chu în zârlientir thung a.

en: For they gat not the land in possession by their own sword, Neither did their own arm save them; But thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, Because thou wast favorable unto them.
hmr: Ram chu hluo dinga anni kâwl- hnâma an lâk a ni nawh a, Anni bâna insandam an ni bawk nawh; An chunga i lâwm leiin, I kut changtieng le, i bân le i hmêl varin a ni lem.

en: Thou art my King, O God: Command deliverance for Jacob.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chu ka Lal i nih, Jakob sanhimna dingin thu pe rawh.

en: Through thee will we push down our adversaries: Through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.
hmr: Nangma leiin a mi dotuhai chu sikthlûng kan ta, I hming leiin a mi thawtuhai chu chîl hrep kan tih.

en: For I will not trust in my bow, Neither shall my sword save me.
hmr: Ka thalngul hi ka ring âwm si nawh a, Ka kâwlhnâm hin mi sandam bawk naw ni.

en: But thou hast saved us from our adversaries, And hast put them to shame that hate us.
hmr: A mi dotuhaia inthawk chun nangin i mi sandam ta lem a, A mi theidatuhai chu i sukmuolpho ta bawk a.

en: In God have we made our boast all the day long, And we will give thanks unto thy name for ever. [Selah
hmr: Sûnnithlâkin Pathien kan sawng a, I hming chu kumkhuoin inpâk bawk kan tih.

en: But now thou hast cast us off, and brought us to dishonor, And goest not forth with our hosts.
hmr: Tu ruok hin chu nangin i mi ngaitha a, i mi sukzak a, Kan sipai ruol lai hlak i suok ve ngai nawh a,

en: Thou makest us to turn back from the adversary; And they that hate us take spoil for themselves.
hmr: A mi dotuhaia inthawk chun i mîn tlânsiettir hlak a, A mi theidatuhai chun sum chu an nuom nuomin an lâk hlak.

en: Thou hast made us like sheep appointed for food, And hast scattered us among the nations.
hmr: Nangin fâk dinga ruot berâm angin i mi pêk a, Hnam tin lai chun i mi sukdar bawk a.

en: Thou sellest thy people for nought, And hast not increased thy wealth by their price.
hmr: I mihai hi iengkhawm niloah i zawr a, An man chu i hausakpui chuong si nawh.

en: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbors, A scoffing and a derision to them that are round about us.
hmr: Nangin kan vêla mihai hrilsietin i mîn umtir a, Kan dep vêla mihai hmusit le nuisanin i mîn umtir bawk a.

en: Thou makest us a byword among the nations, A shaking of the head among the peoples.
hmr: Nangin hnam tin lai chun a se tieng hrilkhinaah i mîn umtir a, Mi tin laia mihai lu thinkhum- in i mîn umtir bawk a.

en: All the day long is my dishonor before me, And the shame of my face hath covered me,
hmr: Kân zakna hi sûnnithlâkin ka hmaah a um hlak a, Ka muolphona hin a mîn khum zo tah,

en: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth, By reason of the enemy and the avenger.
hmr: Hrilhnuoltu le hrilsetu râwl lei le, Hmêlma le phubalatu leiin,

en: All this is come upon us; yet have we not forgotten thee, Neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant.
hmr: Chuong po po chu kan chungah a tlung a; nisienlakhawm, kan theinghil ngai naw cheh a; I thuthlunga hin a tehlêmin kan thaw ngai bawk nawh.

en: Our heart is not turned back, Neither have our steps declined from thy way,
hmr: Kan lungril hi a nghakîr nawh a, Kan ke pênhai hin i lampui chu a pêtsan ngai bawk nawh.

en: That thou hast sore broken us in the place of jackals, And covered us with the shadow of death.
hmr: Nangin sihalhai umnaa mi sawisa hrepa, Thina deihlima an mi khumna dingin.

en: If we have forgotten the name of our God, Or spread forth our hands to a strange god;
hmr: Kan Pathien hming chu theinghilin, Ram dang pathien tienga kan kuthai kan phar chun amanih,

en: Will not God search this out? For he knoweth the secrets of the heart.
hmr: Pathienin chu chu a zawng suok naw ding am a nih? Lungril thup rûkhai hi a hriet zing sih a.

en: Yea, for thy sake are we killed all the day long; We are accounted as sheep for the slaughter.
hmr: Anih, nangma leiin sûnni- thlâka thatin kan um hlak a, Berâm that dinghai anga ngai kan nih.

en: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? Arise, cast us not off for ever.
hmr: Aw LALPA, har ta la, ieng- dinga i in am? Meng la, kumkhuo chun mi ngaitha naw.

en: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, And forgettest our affliction and our oppression?
hmr: Iengleiin am i hmai i thup a, Kan rinumzie le nêksâwr kan tuorzie hi i theinghil hlak chu?

en: For our soul is bowed down to the dust: Our body cleaveth unto the earth.
hmr: Kan hringna hi pilvut sikin a kûn a, Kan phîng hlak hnuoiah a kawp tlat sih a.

en: Rise up for our help, And redeem us for thy lovingkindness’ sake.
hmr: Mi ṭhangpui dingin tho la, I ngilneina lei chun mi sansuok rawh.
